Murphy / Lacy Family Shenanigans
Save the date!

Join your friends and family for a good old time on...

(fix)Saturday, Feb. XX, 2016
at 11am

Located at Huddard Park, Woodside

NOTE: There is a $6 per car entrance fee.

Huddard Park
1100 Kings Mountain Road
Woodside, CA 94062
Zwierlein Picnic Area

More Details

Food & Drink

(FIX) Lunch will be provided the cost is $ xx per person, BUT you should bring your own drinks. Please feel free to bring an appetizer or munchy or desert.

Comfortable Seating

Think about bringing your own Chair. There will be picnic tables, but if you want to sit longer and more comfortably, a chair or seat cushion is recommended.

Fun Activities

The site provides a large grassy area with 2 volleyball courts. There is also enough room for softball, soccer, or football. So, bring your bat, ball and glove, football, soccer ball and portable goal nets.
